weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white, what am I?

hints.text: ⛄ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I fall.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and shine in the sky. I help plants grow, what am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I'm bright.

weather.question: I come from clouds and make things wet. Sometimes you need an umbrella, what am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am water falling from the sky.

weather.question: I am a big, white thing in the sky. Sometimes I'm dark and bring rain, what am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like different shapes.
⛈️ I can bring different kinds of weather.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make the leaves dance. Sometimes I'm gentle, sometimes strong, what am I?

hints.text: 🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🍃 I can make the leaves rustle.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky. I appear after it rains, what am I?

hints.text: 🌞 You need the sun and rain to see me.
✨ I am often seen as magical.

weather.question: I am a flash of light and a loud noise in the sky. I come during a storm, what am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am a spark of electricity.
🌩️ You often hear thunder after seeing me.
⛈️ It is best to stay inside when I appear.

weather.question: I am the sound that follows a flash of light during a storm. I rumble and boom, what am I?

hints.text: 👂 You hear me after you see lightning.
⛈️ I can sometimes shake the ground.

weather.question: I am tiny balls of ice that fall from the sky. I can hurt if I hit you, what am I?

hints.text: 🤕 Sometimes I can create small dents
🥶 I'm cold, and I bounce when I hit the ground.

weather.question: I am very cold. I make you shiver, what am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I am a measure of how hot or cold something is.
🧣 You need to bundle up when I'm around.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 Rabbits like to munch on me

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and pretty colors. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People like to give me as a gift
🌷 I come in many different shapes and sizes

plant.question: I grow on trees, and monkeys love to peel me and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow when I am ripe.

plant.question: I am tall and have a thick trunk and many leaves. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I give shade in the summer

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit that is red inside. We eat me in the summertime. What am I?
I am a long green vegetable that grows on a vine. You can make pickles out of me. What am I?
I have prickly skin and grow in the desert. I don't need much water. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I can survive in a very dry place.
🌵 I have needles instead of leaves

plant.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. People like to dip me in ranch dressing. What am I?
I grow underground and have a brown skin. People mash me and make fries with me. What am I?
I am a plant that has a hard shell and grows on trees. Squirrels love to bury me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 I fall from trees in autumn.
